config.outDir.description: The path relative to the directory of the markdown-file to save the converted files to.
config.document.quality.description: The quality of the rendered file.
config.conversionType.description: Either a single or a set of types to convert the markdown-file to.
config.ignoreLanguage.description: true to convert the current file even if it's not written in Markdown; otherwise false.
config.autoSave.description: true to save the file automatically before the conversion-process; otherwise false.
config.document.name: Name
config.document.name.description:
The file-name to save the converted document to.
Set this value in order to override the name of the markdown-file.
config.document.attributes.description:
The attributes of the document.
They can be included into the document like this: {{ AttributeName }}.
config.document.localization.locale.desc:
The locale to print the date.

Note:
Overrides VSCode's locale.
A format-string to print the date
See: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/8kb3ddd4(v=vs.110).aspx
config.document.layout.margin.top.descri:
The top margin.
Valid units are: 'mm', 'cm', 'in', 'px'. No unit means 'px'
config.document.layout.margin.right.desc:
The right margin.
Valid units are: 'mm', 'cm', 'in', 'px'. No unit means 'px'
config.document.layout.margin.bottom.des:
The bottom margin.
Valid units are: 'mm', 'cm', 'in', 'px'. No unit means 'px'
config.document.layout.margin.left.descr:
The left margin.
Valid units are: 'mm', 'cm', 'in', 'px'. No unit means 'px'
config.document.layout.width.description:
The width of the paper.
Valid units are: 'mm', 'cm', 'in', 'px'. No unit means 'px'
config.document.layout.height.descriptio:
The height of the paper.
Valid units are: 'mm', 'cm', 'in', 'px'. No unit means 'px'
config.document.header.height.descriptio:
The height of the header.
Valid units are: 'mm', 'cm', 'in', 'px'. No unit means 'px'
config.document.header.content.descripti:
The content of the header.
The header can be written in HTML or Markdown.
config.document.header.content.default: {{ Author }}{{ PageNumber }}/{{ PageCount }}
config.document.specialHeaders.descripti: A set of headers for specific pages.
config.document.specialHeaders.pageNumbe: The one-based number of the page to apply the header to.
config.document.evenHeader.description: The header which is applied to even pages.
config.document.oddHeader.description: The header which is applied to odd pages.
config.document.lastHeader.description: The header which is applied to the last page.
config.document.footer.height.descriptio:
The height of the footer.
Valid units are: 'mm', 'cm', 'in', 'px'. No unit means 'px'
config.document.footer.content.descripti:
The content of the footer.
The footer can be written in HTML or Markdown.
config.document.footer.content.default: {{ CreationDate }}
config.document.specialFooters.descripti: A set of footers for specific pages.
config.document.specialFooters.pageNumbe: The one-based number of the page to apply the footer to.
config.document.evenFooter.description: The footer which is applied to even pages.
config.document.oddFooter.description: The footer which is applied to odd pages.
config.document.lastFooter.description: The footer which is applied to the last page.
config.document.style.template.descripti:
The path to the template of the document.
Note: {{{styles}}}'s replaced by the css-styles
{{{content}}}'s replaced by the body of the document.
config.document.style.wrapper.descriptio:
The wrapper of the codument.
Note: {{ content }}'s replaced by the body of the document.

Example:
<div class="container">{{ content }}<div>
config.document.style.enableSystemStyles: true to save include the system-provided styles; otherwise false.
config.document.style.styleSheets.descri:
Stylesheets to include in the document.
They can either be a local path or an URI.
